name: parallel-builder-merge
description: For greenfield CLI builds: decompose into 2-3 leads with non-overlapping file areas. When parallel builders create independent copies of shared deps, expect merge conflicts. Auto-resolve works but run quality gates after — API mismatches require fixup.
Leads cant use Write tool due to hooks — they stall trying to write spec files
resolution: Nudge leads to pass context through dispatch mail instead. Budget 5+ min planning before nudging.

title: Merge order matters for parallel builders
rationale: Most complete builder first so auto-resolve keeps full implementations over stubs. Tests branch last since it depends on source existing. Proven in seeds build where commands-builder was primary.
